name: Tower Builder (itch) (johnperes)
description:
The game features 10 levels where you have to build towers of different sizes and in random wind conditions, you cannot lose, but your final score depends of the number of tower blocks you used to beat the whole game, post your score if you finish it!

Thanks for playing!

How to play

  • A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Move the hook
  • Mouse Left Button - Drop the tower block

Music Credits

  • Complete Music Collection FREE Edition

This game was made by johnperes for the Geta Game Jam 12 with the theme "Unstable" and hardmode challenge "Two Colours".
